mil3.3.12:2.2: “Yathā, mahārāja, nagaraguttiko majjhe nagarasiṅghāṭake nisinno passeyya puratthimadisato purisaṃ āgacchantaṃ, passeyya dakkhiṇadisato purisaṃ āgacchantaṃ, passeyya pacchimadisato purisaṃ āgacchantaṃ, passeyya uttaradisato purisaṃ āgacchantaṃ;
mil3.3.12:2.3: evameva kho, mahārāja, yañca puriso cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, taṃ viññāṇena vijānāti.
mil3.3.12:2.4: Yañca sotena saddaṃ suṇāti, taṃ viññāṇena vijānāti.
mil3.3.12:2.5: Yañca ghānena gandhaṃ ghāyati, taṃ viññāṇena vijānāti.
mil3.3.12:2.6: Yañca jivhāya rasaṃ sāyati, taṃ viññāṇena vijānāti.
mil3.3.12:2.7: Yañca kāyena phoṭṭhabbaṃ phusati, taṃ viññāṇena vijānāti, yañca manasā dhammaṃ vijānāti, taṃ viññāṇena vijānāti.
